overview:
Ken Shipley

Klaus Ken Shipley (born August 6, 1979) is an entrepreneur who was well known for his web design and graphic art work. Before building his company he developed many websites for local businesses and the government of Antigua and Barbuda. Today he runs his own company, Search Antigua, Inc. which is the country’s first Search Engine.

Career

As a young man he got his first break in the technology business when he became the Webmaster for a popular online casino, he controlled the companies websites, maintained their high standards and spearheaded development work on new projects. He afterwards went on his own to become a freelance web designer, where he developed numerous websites for businesses all over the country.

After years of building websites Ken partnered with Google to create the first Antigua and Barbuda search engine company. The concept is unique to the island and the rest of the region because it provides information that is specific to Antigua and Barbuda. In addition, the website www.SearchAntigua.com offers several other features such as classified listings, photo gallery and an event calendar so that users of the site have a variety of services to choose from. Today the company employs’s three persons and the number of hits on the website is getting bigger everyday.
